casebody.data:
Andres RHODES
v.
COMMISSIONER OF CORRECTION Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided September 13, 2017

Kinga A. Kostaniak, assigned counsel, in support of the petition.

The petitioner Andres Rhodes' petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 172 Conn.App. 905, 159 A.3d 240 (2017), is denied.
